definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

sentences.english: Be careful , the paint may smear .
I would cry, tears staining the ink, a smudged idea of love.
sentences.chinese: 我哭，淚水把字跡化掉，把愛念塗污。

sentences.english: The ink has blotted out the words.
